sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Router from 'next/router'

import { Button, ButtonMin } from '../../controls/Button/Button'
import {
  Title,
  WrapButton,
  TipWrapper,
  Label,
  CheckLabel,
  TipWrapper2,
} from './../../Layouts/styledLayouts'
import { Text } from '../../StyledComponents/Text'
import { Divider } from '../../StyledComponents/Divider'
import { OfferBlue1, OfferBlue2, OfferBlue3, WrapperIcon } from '../../StyledComponents/Icon'
import styled from 'styled-components'
import { device } from '../../../lib/mediaDevice'
import { Column } from '../../StyledComponents/Grid'

const HowWillBook = ({ handleChangeStep }) => {
  return (
    <>
      <Title mb={35}>Here’s how clients will book your offer</Title>
      <Wrap>
        <Box>
          <WrapperIcon>
            <OfferBlue1 />
          </WrapperIcon>
          <Text textCenter fz={18} mb={10} mt={15}>
            Qualified clients find your offer
          </Text>
          <Text textCenter>
            Anyone who wants to book your offer needs to confirm their contact information, provide
            payment details, and tell you about their events.
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <WrapperIcon mt={50}>
            <OfferBlue2 />
          </WrapperIcon>
          <Text textCenter fz={18} mb={10} mt={30}>
            You choose the ones who can book
          </Text>
          <Text textCenter>
            To book available dates without having to send a request, client must agree to your
            needs and meet all the requirements you set.
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box>
          <WrapperIcon mt={50}>
            <OfferBlue3 />
          </WrapperIcon>
          <Text textCenter fz={18} mb={10} mt={30}>
            Once a client books, you get notified
          </Text>
          <Text textCenter>
            You’ll immediately get a confirmation email with complete information about the time of
            the event, its location, etc.
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Wrap>
    </>
  )
}

export default HowWillBook

const Box = styled.div``
const Wrap = styled.div`
  @media ${device.laptopDesktop} {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;

    ${Box} {
      width: 30%;
    }

    ${WrapperIcon} {
      margin-top: 0;
      height: 100px;
    }
    ${Text} {
      margin-top: 20px;
    }
  }
`
